Name: Mazes and Mages 2
About the game: In Mazes and Mages 2 you have to find your way in random mazes and play card duels against enemies. You create a random maze, choosing a rank, difficulty, and mode (casual or hardcore) for it. Each randomly generated maze has 5 levels. By defeating enemies and picking up chests you get cards and items, which you use to make your deck stronger. When you defeat the boss at the end of the maze, the next rank becomes available, with stronger cards and items. There are 20 ranks.
